content.raw:
Is it possible that this function is never used by gazebo it self ?
And only used with ROS when using the PositionJointInterface in urdf ?

This could explain why we saw this bug now even if the bug is from a commit in 2014.
Since ROS users use indigo with gazebo 2 and just start to migrate to ROS kinetic with gazebo 7.
